projects.description:
Attribute Based Image Querying System
Sep 2016 – May 2017

Project descriptionFinal year research project to retrieve images considering the semantic understanding of images inspired by machine learning, deep learning and natural language processing technologies. Through this research project we tested the hypothesis that learning strong feature representations of images can enhance the semantic understanding of images by machines. Through this project a novel recursive hierarchical clustering algorithm is proposed to detect the local optima of the number of clusters of a dataset. A hierarchical clustering approach for clustering images into semantically meaningful mixture types based on a recursive hierarchical clustering algorithm prioritizing the most important features from a high dimensional dataset is developed. Secondly a Convolution Neural Network model to extract the visual patterns with regard to attribute mixture types of the images using deep learning schema by training deep representations of the semantically meaningful attribute mixture types is developed. Thirdly a natural language processing module which decrypts the visual patterns from the Convolution Neural Network module to semantically meaningful natural language representations and the querying by open language text has been developed. An integrated system capable of automatic annotating of images using natural language considering the semantic meaning of images is developed by integrating the above mentioned core modules. Furthermore image querying using natural language queries has also been achieved by the system.

Technologies and tools- Python, MATLAB, Caffe, Tensorflow, Elastic Search, NLTK dependency parser

Other creators
Pavani De Silva Damith Dilshan

Project descriptionCenterPEDE (cen·ter·pead) is the performance testing tool developed at Virtusa bringing together the best of the open source and commercial worlds.

CenterPEDE was developed under the following objectives:

Align and integrate the phases of the performance testing life-cycle.

Increase the user-friendliness and accelerate the performance testing activities.

Nurturing from the robustness of JMeter for web based application performance testing.

Provide comprehensive detailed performance testing results for easier reliable analysis.

Limit the burden on the tool during test execution, to ensure it does not skew the results of the AUT falsely.Online CV System
Aug 2011 – Jul 2012

Project descriptionIn this online CV system we provide facilities to undergraduates to maintain their own profile while they are studying in the university. They can include their details in their own profile and specially their academic qualifications. These unique profiles must be updated daily by either undergraduates or the universities .We ensures that only these two parties can update the profiles. As an example, when a student finishes his/her level -2 in the university, the relevant department or the faculty has the authority to update the profile mentioning the course modules and the grades, that student have obtained. If a student follows an external course they can update their own profiles with that information but they have to prove it by including references. The most important fact is that the system provides the facility to employer companies to know whether the profile is updated by the student or the university. 
When the students leave the university after their graduation they have a complete profile with every necessary details. As a result of that employer companies who are willing to work with fresh and young employees can easily get the information regarding the available CV s on the system .The system has the advantage of finding the employees with qualifications by a filtering system. As an example, a company wants to have a new employee who is capable of web developing, programming with 2-year experience in industry. The company only has to enter these qualifications and submit it on to the system. It immediately gives the list of employees who have those qualifications. And by pressing a one single button they can get the printed CV of that employee.Ultimate Transport System for Buses
Feb 2012 – Mar 2012

Project descriptionAs everyone knows well, there can't be seen a proper time scheduled transportation system in Sri Lanka. So we came up with a solution for that and we implemented this product in the Colombo Hackathon - The first ever hackathon in Sri Lanka. Simply we use a mobile application and we use Android mobile development and USSD technologies in the mobile application. Main server is run in java Tomcat server. We plan to introduce this product to customers near future through the help of Etiselat mobile partners in Sri Lanka.Automated Message System for Education institutes

Project descriptionThe aim of this project is to develop an Automatic messaging system for students and academic staff members of Universities and Institutes to send and receive academic information through the SMS technology among them and develop a database to store the student’s information. This system will work as a bridge between students and members of the academic staff.

It is a new platform that enables acquirers to quickly provide smart phone driven Magnetic Stripe and Chip Card payment solutions to small and medium-sized merchants.
With eZGO, Merchant Smart Phone is transformed into a secure point-of-sale device and it is plugged in with a Card Reader, which meets following industry security standards: EMV Level 1, EMV Level 2, PCI PTS 3.0, SRED, PA DSS, and PCI DSS.
The Card Reader connects to a smart phone or tab via audio jack and enables merchants to accept both Magnetic Stripe and Chip Cards using a secure Mobile Application. The Application is compatible across all platforms including Android, iOS, Blackberry and Windows Phone.
The unique design and security architecture of the Mobile App delivers 1st level point-to-point data encryption and high end Terminal Line Encryption (TLE). All transaction related security keys are stored in a Secure Area of the Smart Phone which is 100% fool proof and inaccessible to unauthorized entities.
Solution provides the capability in capturing customer signature prior to authorization and the digital receipt for completed transaction could be sent via an SMS or an E-mail.Customer service evaluation systems. (SCSE)

Transbridge Monitoring Tool - LOLC
Aug 2014 – Aug 2014

Project descriptionTransbridge is designed to plug any ATM network and core banking backend. Financial institutes need a bridge to connect back end with third party ATMs. ATMs communicate with their backend via ISO 8583 messages.
ISO Transabridge is designed to break and construct ISO 8583 messages. It is a matter of time to implement interfaces to break vendor specific ISO formats and backend transaction handling. We have followed Factory and Proxy design patterns to overcome the issue of connecting ATM networks and back end.
The product is released with a monitoring tool and ISO message generator. Monitoring tool is used to monitor sever status and transaction history. ISO message generator is designed to act as ATM for testing connectivity and transactions.
